oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Model 1860 General Officers sword with scabbard
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a US Model 1860 General Officers and Staff sword and scabbard. This sword model was adopted just prior to the Civil War and was to be the sword for all general officers and staff officers. It continued to be used until the early 1900s.; This example was made by Ridabock and Company probaby in the 1880s.
